thread.title: With Harbaugh gone, Kaepernick is obvious fall guy for 49ers

author: Ann Killion
title: With Harbaugh gone, Kaepernick is obvious fall guy for 49ers
text:
Photo: Christian Petersen, Getty Images Quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the field after the 47-7 loss at Arizona two weeks ago. Quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the field after the 47-7...
Colin Kaepernick is at a crossroads. In the crosshairs. On national television, with everyone watching. Quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the field after the 47-7 loss at Arizona two weeks ago. Quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the field after the 47-7...
Colin Kaepernick is at a crossroads. In the crosshairs. On national television, with everyone watching.
